title: White wine and lemon baked cod
ingredients: ['4 (200g) cod fillets', 'butter for greasing', '2 lemons, thinly sliced', '3 onions, sliced', '1 bunch fresh parsley, chopped', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '250ml white wine', '6 tablespoons breadcrumbs', '45g butter, cut into small pieces', 'olives for garnish (optional)']
